attributes.action: Have a referendum to change the voting system in NORTHERN IRELAND
attributes.additional_details: Because the voting system is outdated
attributes.background: Stop one party being able to collapse Stormont

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure how you'd like the voting system to change.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, or you might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616176
